resources.string: When you find yourself in times of trouble, and mother mary doesn´t come to you. We´ll show you paths of wisdom, so you can go pee. Let it be. And in the hours of darnkess, with bushes standing right in front of you. let it be, let it be. All the people of that street agree. Grab your phone and find a toilet. Go there and pee. Let it be.
